div.head: 五色帶下
div.div: multi-color discharge from below the belt

bibl.title: Ben cao gang mu dictionary Vol1

entry.def: multi-color discharge from below the belt

sense.def: Pathological Condition of dai xia bing 帶下病 , diseases of discharge from below the belt, with a discharge of turbid matter of mixed colors from the vagina, sometimes green as pus, sometimes dark red as rotten blood, sometimes watery and turbid like the slop from rinsing rice. Qian jin bei ji fang 千金備急方 26: 治五色帶下方：服大豆紫湯，日三服 , “Recipe to cure multi-color discharge from below the belt : Ingest the ‘purple decoction with da dou ’ three times daily”.
